definition: vocational high school (abbr. to 職高|职高[zhi2 gao1])

pinyin: Zhi2 ye4 Gao1 er3 fu1 qiu2 Xie2 hui4

sentences.english: I was a graduate of Guangzhou Vocational Middle School of Tourism.
sentences.chinese: 我是广州旅游职业中学毕业生。

sentences.english: They will expect a career growth and a magnificent actualization of a number of projects.
sentences.chinese: 他们会预期到职业的成长，一些项目会漂亮的完成。

sentences.english: He was very open about his inspiration and his plans for his career.
sentences.chinese: 对于他的梦想和职业生涯计划，韩庚是很公开的。

sentences.english: What changes have you made in the course of your career?
sentences.chinese: 在你的职业生涯中你已经做了什么改变？

sentences.english: Just where do the politics of IT workers lie?
sentences.chinese: 政治职业IT工作者的谎言来自何处？

sentences.english: But unless you get paid to play videogames, you’re kind of not accomplishing stuff.
sentences.chinese: 但除非你是职业玩家，你什么也没实现。

sentences.english: Which classes benefit most from Jewelcrafting?
sentences.chinese: 哪个职业将会从宝石学中受益最大？

sentences.english: There’s no doubt that law schools have overbuilt and that the legal profession has overpromised.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，法学院过多了，并对法定职业夸下海口。

sentences.english: And certain high-risk professions and hobbies usually have to be disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 某些高风险职业和业余爱好通常也必须予以说明澄清。

sentences.english: I was recruited to play intercollegiate basketball and became a professional player.
sentences.chinese: 开始打的是大学篮球，后来成为了一名职业球员。

sentences.english: A noble professional virtue is in accord with the fundamental interests of the Party and the people.
sentences.chinese: 崇高的职业道德是与党和人民的根本利益相一致的。

sentences.english: The result of occupational disease checkup should be announced to trade union.
sentences.chinese: 并及时向工会通报职业病检查情况。

sentences.english: W2: The most important people in my country are definitely professional athletes.
sentences.chinese: 我们国家的风云人物当然是职业运动员了。

sentences.english: We got to the play in the major league.
sentences.chinese: 我们队有机会参加职业联赛了。

sentences.english: The archival jobholders appears to be tired.
sentences.chinese: 档案从业人员出现职业倦怠。

sentences.english: God uses every profession to serve other people.
sentences.chinese: 神使用每一个职业来为其他人服事。
